bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to repeal the inheritance tax. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-40 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The provisions of chapter 10-40 do not apply to the transfer of any real or personal property from any person who dies on or after July 1, 1997. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to repeal the inheritance tax. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-40 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The provisions of chapter 10-40 do not apply to the transfer of any real or personal property from any person who dies on or after July 1, 1999. BILL HISTORY 1/16/97 First read in Senate and referred to Taxation. S.J. 48 1/24/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 1/24/97 Deferred to another day. S.J. 154 1/29/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 1/29/97 Deferred to another day. S.J. 205 2/5/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/5/97 Taxation Do Pass Amended, AYES 5, NAYS 4. S.J. 319
